title: AA will not connect to my 2018 Hyundai Sonata using Google Pixel 3 XL that is up to date. Everytime
content:
AA will not connect to my 2018 Hyundai Sonata using Google Pixel 3 XL that is up to date.
Everytime I connected the USB-C cord it comes back with can't connect "exitâ€œ. I know that the cord works because my wife has a older Android phone running OS 9 and it works perfectly displaying Waze on the head unit. When I go into USB settings it will not let me change over to Android Auto.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3 XL
